## Token.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Token` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(tokenMintAddress: string, metaplex: Metaplex, storage: ThirdwebStorage);
```

| Parameter        | Type            | Description |
| ---------------- | --------------- | ----------- |
| tokenMintAddress | string          |             |
| metaplex         | Metaplex        |             |
